verses.verse: וְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> And if a soul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> now if תֶחֱטָ֗א <WH2398> sin וְשָֽׁמְעָה֙ <WH8085> and hear ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice אָלָ֔ה <WH423> of swearing וְה֣וּא <WH1931> he עֵ֔ד <WH5707> and [is] a witness א֥וֹ <WH176> whether רָאָ֖ה <WH7200> he hath seen א֣וֹ <WH176> or יָדָ֑ע <WH3045> or known אִם־ <WH518> if ל֥וֹא <WH3808> does not יַגִּ֖יד <WH5046> [of it] if he do not utter וְנָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> [it] then he shall bear עֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH5771> his iniquity

א֣וֹ <WH176> Or נֶ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> Or if a soul אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> if תִּגַּע֮ <WH5060> touch בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any דָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> thing טָמֵא֒ <WH2931> any unclean אוֹ֩ <WH176> whether בְנִבְלַ֨ת <WH5038> whether [it be] a carcase חַיָּ֜ה <WH2416> beast טְמֵאָ֗ה <WH2931> of an unclean א֤וֹ <WH176> or בְּנִבְלַת֙ <WH5038> or a carcase בְּהֵמָ֣ה <WH929> cattle טְמֵאָ֔ה <WH2931> of unclean א֕וֹ <WH176> or בְּנִבְלַ֖ת <WH5038> or the carcase שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> creeping things טָמֵ֑א <WH2931> of unclean וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <WH5956> and [if] it be hidden מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and he טָמֵ֖א <WH2931> from him he also shall be unclean וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <WH816> and guilty

א֣וֹ <WH176> Or כִ֤י <WH3588> if יִגַּע֙ <WH5060> Or if he touch בְּטֻמְאַ֣ת <WH2932> the uncleanness אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> of whatever טֻמְאָת֔וֹ <WH2932> whatsoever uncleanness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יִטְמָ֖א <WH2930> [it be] that a man shall be defiled בָּ֑הּ וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <WH5956> withal and it be hid מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at וְה֥וּא <WH1931> he יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> from him when he knoweth וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <WH816> [of it] then he shall be guilty

א֣וֹ <WH176> Or נֶ֡פֶשׁ <WH5315> Or if a soul כִּ֣י <WH3588> if תִשָּׁבַע֩ <WH7650> swear לְבַטֵּ֨א <WH981> pronouncing בִשְׂפָתַ֜יִם <WH8193> with [his] lips לְהָרַ֣ע ׀ <WH7489> to do evil א֣וֹ <WH176> or לְהֵיטִ֗יב <WH3190> or to do good לְ֠כֹל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יְבַטֵּ֧א <WH981> shall pronounce הָאָדָ֛ם <WH120> whatsoever [it be] that a man בִּשְׁבֻעָ֖ה <WH7621> with an oath וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <WH5956> and it be hid מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at וְהוּא־ <WH1931> he יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> from him when he knoweth וְאָשֵׁ֖ם <WH816> [of it] then he shall be guilty לְאַחַ֥ת <WH259> in one מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> of these

וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become כִֽי־ <WH3588> shall be when יֶאְשַׁ֖ם <WH816> And it shall be when he shall be guilty לְאַחַ֣ת <WH259> in one מֵאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> of these וְהִ֨תְוַדָּ֔ה <WH3034> of these [things] that he shall confess אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָטָ֖א <WH2398> that he hath sinned עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> shall also

וְהֵבִ֣יא <WH935> And he shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשָׁמ֣וֹ <WH817> his trespass offering לַיהוָ֡ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עַ֣ל <WH5921> his behalf חַטָּאתוֹ֩ <WH2403> for his sin אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which חָטָ֜א <WH2398> which he hath sinned נְקֵבָ֨ה <WH5347> a female מִן־ <WH4480> from הַצֹּ֥אן <WH6629> from the flock כִּשְׂבָּ֛ה <WH3776> a lamb אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or שְׂעִירַ֥ת <WH8166> or a kid עִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> of the goats לְחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> for a sin offering וְכִפֶּ֥ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> his behalf הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> and the priest מֵחַטָּאתֽוֹ׃ <WH2403> for him concerning his sin

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֨א <WH3808> cannot תַגִּ֣יע <WH5060> to bring יָדוֹ֮ <WH3027> And if he דֵּ֣י <WH1767> be not able שֶׂה֒ <WH7716> a lamb וְהֵבִ֨יא <WH935> then he shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשָׁמ֜וֹ <WH817> his trespass אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָטָ֗א <WH2398> which he hath committed שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> two תֹרִ֛ים <WH8449> turtledoves אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> or two בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> young יוֹנָ֖ה <WH3123> pigeons לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> one לְחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> for a sin offering וְאֶחָ֥ד <WH259> and the other לְעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> for a burnt offering

וְהֵבִ֤יא <WH935> And he shall bring אֹתָם֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> them unto the priest וְהִקְרִ֛יב <WH7126> who shall offer אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לַחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> [that] which [is] for the sin offering רִאשׁוֹנָ֑ה <WH7223> first וּמָלַ֧ק <WH4454> and wring off אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֛וֹ <WH7218> his head מִמּ֥וּל <WH4136> from עָרְפּ֖וֹ <WH6203> his neck וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יַבְדִּֽיל׃ <WH914> but shall not divide [it] asunder

וְהִזָּ֞ה <WH5137> And he shall sprinkle מִדַּ֤ם <WH1818> of the blood הַחַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> of the sin offering עַל־ <WH5921> on קִ֣יר <WH7023> upon the side הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> of the altar וְהַנִּשְׁאָ֣ר <WH7604> and the rest בַּדָּ֔ם <WH1818> of the blood יִמָּצֵ֖ה <WH4680> shall be wrung out אֶל־ <WH413> at יְס֣וֹד <WH3247> at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> of the altar חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> it [is] a sin offering הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשֵּׁנִ֛י <WH8145> the second יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> And he shall offer עֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> [for] a burnt offering כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> according to the manner וְכִפֶּ֨ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <WH5921> his behalf הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> and the priest מֵחַטָּאת֥וֹ <WH2403> for him for his sin אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which חָטָ֖א <WH2398> which he hath sinned וְנִסְלַ֥ח <WH5545> and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃ ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹא֩ <WH3808> not תַשִּׂ֨יג <WH5381> be not able to bring יָד֜וֹ <WH3027> But if he לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> two תֹרִ֗ים <WH8449> turtledoves אוֹ֮ <WH176> or לִשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> or two בְנֵי־ <WH1121> young יוֹנָה֒ <WH3123> pigeons וְהֵבִ֨יא <WH935> shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנ֜וֹ <WH7133> for his offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָטָ֗א <WH2398> then he that sinned עֲשִׂירִ֧ת <WH6224> the tenth הָאֵפָ֛ה <WH374> part of an ephah סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour לְחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> for a sin offering לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יָשִׂ֨ים <WH7760> he shall put עָלֶ֜יהָ <WH5921> and שֶׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> no oil וְלֹא־ <WH3808> or יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> upon it neither shall he put עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> and לְבֹנָ֔ה <WH3828> [any] frankincense כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> thereon for it [is] a sin offering הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> He

וֶהֱבִיאָהּ֮ <WH935> Then shall he bring אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵן֒ <WH3548> it to the priest וְקָמַ֣ץ <WH7061> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֣ן ׀ <WH3548> and the priest מִ֠מֶּנָּה <WH4480> at מְל֨וֹא <WH4393> all along קֻמְצ֜וֹ <WH7062> handful אֶת־ <WH853> אַזְכָּרָתָה֙ <WH234> of it [even] a memorial וְהִקְטִ֣יר <WH6999> thereof and burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> [it] on the altar עַ֖ל <WH5921> with אִשֵּׁ֣י <WH801> according to the offerings made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> it [is] a sin offering הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

וְכִפֶּר֩ <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֨יו <WH5921> concerning הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> And the priest עַל־ <WH5921> concerning חַטָּאת֧וֹ <WH2403> for him as touching his sin אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which חָטָ֛א <WH2398> that he hath sinned מֵֽאַחַ֥ת <WH259> in one מֵאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> of these וְנִסְלַ֣ח <WH5545> of these and it shall be forgiven ל֑וֹ וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> shall become לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> him and [the remnant] shall be the priest's כַּמִּנְחָֽה׃ <WH4503> as a meat offering ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

נֶ֚פֶשׁ <WH5315> If a soul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If תִמְעֹ֣ל <WH4603> commit מַ֔עַל <WH4604> a trespass וְחָֽטְאָה֙ <WH2398> and sin בִּשְׁגָגָ֔ה <WH7684> through ignorance מִקָּדְשֵׁ֖י <WH6944> in the holy things יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְהֵבִיא֩ <WH935> then he shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשָׁמ֨וֹ <WH817> for his trespass לַֽיהוָ֜ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אַ֧יִל <WH352> a ram תָּמִ֣ים <WH8549> without blemish מִן־ <WH4480> against הַצֹּ֗אן <WH6629> out of the flocks בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֛ <WH6187> with thy estimation כֶּֽסֶף־ <WH3701> of silver שְׁקָלִ֥ים <WH8255> by shekels בְּשֶֽׁקֶל־ <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary לְאָשָֽׁם׃ <WH817> for a trespass offering

וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which חָטָ֨א <WH2398> for the harm מִן־ <WH4480> against הַקֹּ֜דֶשׁ <WH6944> that he hath done in the holy thing יְשַׁלֵּ֗ם <WH7999> And he shall make amends וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמִֽישִׁתוֹ֙ <WH2549> the fifth part יוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> and shall add עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> of וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> thereto and give אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> it unto the priest וְהַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> and the priest יְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> with בְּאֵ֥יל <WH352> for him with the ram הָאָשָׁ֖ם <WH817> of the trespass offering וְנִסְלַ֥ח <WH5545> and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃ פ

וְאִם־ <WH518> now if נֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <WH5315> And if a soul כִּ֣י <WH3588> for תֶֽחֱטָ֔א <WH2398> sin וְעָֽשְׂתָ֗ה <WH6213> and commit אַחַת֙ <WH259> any מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all manner מִצְוֹ֣ת <WH4687> by the commandments יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֵעָשֶׂ֑ינָה <WH6213> of these things which are forbidden to be done וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> though he wist וְאָשֵׁ֖ם <WH816> [it] not yet is he guilty וְנָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> and shall bear עֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH5771> his iniquity

וְ֠הֵבִיא <WH935> And he shall bring אַ֣יִל <WH352> a ram תָּמִ֧ים <WH8549> without blemish מִן־ <WH4480> from הַצֹּ֛אן <WH6629> out of the flock בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <WH6187> with thy estimation לְאָשָׁ֖ם <WH817> for a trespass offering אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> unto the priest וְכִפֶּר֩ <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֨יו <WH5921> concerning הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> and the priest עַ֣ל <WH5921> concerning שִׁגְגָת֧וֹ <WH7684> for him concerning his ignorance אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שָׁגָ֛ג <WH7683> wherein he erred וְה֥וּא <WH1931> he לֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> and wist וְנִסְלַ֥ח <WH5545> [it] not and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃
אָשָׁ֖ם <WH817> It [is] a trespass offering ה֑וּא <WH1931> he אָשֹׁ֥ם <WH816> he hath certainly אָשַׁ֖ם <WH816> trespassed לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> against the LORD פ
